posts.postText: Hey, i just recently got into airsoft. I was looking for some cheap but decent guns. Anyone know a place?
Define cheap. I have a great airsof fn scar but it was 300$

Airsoft can be quite expensive. The only high quality guns you are going to find for under 100 are pistols. Here's a fairly good electric one for about 135.
http://www.airsoftgunroom.com/py-1551.html

This. Its light, insanely fast, relatively cheap, reliable, and it uses co2 canisters which can be bought at nearly sporting goods store.

http://www.airgundepot.com/tactical-force-tf11-airsoft.html
